channel.title: hexo on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hexo on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Hexo and Middleman
item.description: ##17:15 Thursday 12 February 2015 JST## Well, Hexo looks great without any modification, and handled my journal directory without complaints… but it’s slowwww (with entries spanning 23 years (and more to come after I port years 199-2004)). Middleman had some complaints, and looks like ass, but it’s fast!!! I fixed the complaints (boo hoo the date in filename doesn’t match the date in frontmatter. who fuckin’ cares? Use one to override the other!
